page.title: 14FORSTER PARK
page.content: Forster park on one side is pure green with loads of dark green trees.On the other side it has some pretty yellow and pink flowers.There is also a forest full of leaves on the ground fluttering bout.There are plenty of park benches for people to sit on.We also play games in the park like football and rounders. Instead of just the park that you can look at there's a park where you can play and muck around on swings,slides, round-abouts,climbing-frames and see-saws.On the other side of the park there's a nursery for younger children where there is a little paddling pool for when it gets hot.This nursery is for the ages of 3-5 years old.
